message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it's a game-changer that could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential, we believe it's worth more than $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, we propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a fantastic deal considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. We understand that making such a significant investment requires careful thought, so please take your time to consider our offer. Should you decide to proceed, we look forward to welcoming you as a valued client.
